channel.title: Cannot run
channel.description:
[code]@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause [/code]
Is my code in my run.bat, but it gives me this error. [img]http://img847.imageshack.us/img847/4233/59542561.png[/img]
If someone can please give me the proper code for a server run.bat and client run.bat and the compiler for 64 bit computers, it would be appreciated.

item.title: Cannot run

This still doesn’t work.

item.title: Cannot run
item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon
item.description:
@SGTCannon wrote:

This is for client, I will post my server’s run when I get home

Non x86

@Echo off java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit

x86

@Echo off ECHO You may now close this window Cd bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\Javaw.exe" -Xmx254m -classpath .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 Exit

This belongs in client help, just so you know for next time.

Read full topic
